title: Vaxx Hesitancy Down? Ted Lasso Is An iPhone 9.1.21
itunes:title: Vaxx Hesitancy Down? Ted Lasso Is An iPhone 9.1.21
description:
In episode 981, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Like Mother star Alison Stevenson to discuss the South Dakota attorney general who killed a man, vaccine mandates, fake vaccine cards, movie theaters needing vaccine mandates, Mike Richards finally being fired, Ted Lasso and product placement, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. South Dakota Attorney General Who Killed Man in Crash Gets Speeding Ticket
  2. “I DID NOT KNOW IT WAS A MAN”: THE SURREAL STORY OF HOW A DEADLY CRASH UPENDED SOUTH DAKOTA POLITICS
  3. Axios-Ipsos poll: Vaccine hesitancy may be crumbling
  4. Can the US crack down on fake vaccination cards?
  5. Sony Surprises At CinemaCon With ‘Ghostbusters: Afterlife’ Screening
  6. For Movie Theaters, A Pivotal Fall Season Begins at CinemaCon
  7. Venom: Let There Be Carnage May Be Delayed Until 2022. Will More Fall Movies Follow?
  8. Delta Variant Disrupts Moviegoing Comfort Levels as Studios Worry
  9. Movie Theaters in Some Cities Now Check for Vaccine Proof, Raising Fears About Release Delays
  10. Vaccine Mandates Are ‘Mixed Bag’ for Movie Theaters, NATO CEO John Fithian Says (Video)
  11. The Way Forward for Movie Theaters Is Clear
  12. Mike Richards Out As EP On ‘Jeopardy!’ & ‘Wheel Of Fortune’
  13. The Ted Lasso backlash was inevitable
  14. A Notchless Next-Gen iPhone Inexplicably Pops Up in Ted Lasso
  15. Apple’s Gadgets Co-Star in Its New TV Drama
  16. ‘Servant’ Review: Season 2 Is the Creepiest Ad for Apple Products Yet
  17. Apple won’t let bad guys use iPhones in movies, says Knives Out director
  18. Ted Lasso Ushers In A Powerful New Era In Product Placement
  19. LISTEN: Men I Trust - Sugar

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
